import React from "react" import { Heading } from "../common/Heading" import { contact } from "../data/dummydata" export const Contact = () => { function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm() } return ( <>
{contact.map((item) => (
{item.icon}

{item.text1}

{item.text2}

))}
) }
